combatMove.name: Power Kick
combatMove.description: [npc.verb(Throw)] a powerful kick to [npc.his] target, dealing formattedDamageInflicted damage.
combatMove.availabilityDescription: Available to characters who have the 'bipedal' leg configuration and undergone 'unarmed combat' training.
combatMove.criticalDescription: It's the only move being used.
combatMove.movePredictionDescriptionWithTarget: [npc.verb(Deliver)] a powerful kick to [npc2.namePos], dealing formattedDamageInflicted damage. #IF(npc.isLegMovementHindered()) [style.italicsTerrible(Damage is reduced to 0 as [npc.his] legs are hindered!)] #ENDIF
combatMove.movePredictionDescriptionNoTarget: npc.verb(Deliver)] a powerful kick to [npc.him], dealing formattedDamageInflicted damage. #IF(npc.isLegMovementHindered()) [style.italicsTerrible(Damage is reduced to 0 as [npc.his] legs are hindered!)] #ENDIF

performMove.execute: #IF(npc.isLegMovementHindered()) As [npc.his] legs are hindered, [npc.name] [npc.verb(fail)] to perform kicks [npc2.name], and [npc.verb(end)] up doing no damage at all... #ELSE [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lunge)] forward and [npc.verb(deliver)] a concussive kick to [npc2.name]! #ENDIF formattedHealthDamage
